name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Node.js Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application development. Proficient in **Node.js**, API design, and **Docker** for containerization, along with a strong background in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines to streamline development processes. Adept in security protocols including **OAuth2**, **SAML**, and **SSO** to ensure robust application access controls.

Expertise in frontend technologies such as **React**, and a solid understanding of module bundling and **infrastructure-as-code** practices. Hands-on experience in building scalable applications using both backend and frontend stacks. Proven ability to integrate AI/ML capabilities within applications and deploy cloud-native systems on AWS and Azure. Strong background in compliance-driven development and MLOps business strategies.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed high-performance applications using **Node.js** to build scalable APIs, ensuring seamless integration and user experience across platforms.
• Maintained CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Docker** and automation tools, optimizing deployment and infrastructure through **infrastructure-as-code** practices while ensuring rapid and reliable releases.
• Implemented OAuth2, SAML, and SSO protocols for secure authentication across microservices, enhancing data privacy and user security on a platform serving over **100,000** users monthly.
• Designed and optimized user interfaces with **React**, emphasizing responsive design principles to accommodate various device types, reaching over **95%** user satisfaction in feedback surveys.
• Spearheaded the transition of monolithic systems to microservices architectures using **Docker** and **Node.js**, resulting in a **50%** reduction in system downtime and increased scalability for diverse applications.
• Utilized **Golang** for performance-critical backend services, achieving a response time reduction of up to **30%** compared to previous implementations.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure comprehensive API documentation and integration guidelines, facilitating collaboration and speedy onboarding of new developers.
• Leveraged module bundling techniques to optimize application load times and enhance overall performance, leading to improved user engagement and retention.
• Monitored and analyzed system performance metrics to fine-tune infrastructure, achieving an **80%** increase in overall system responsiveness due to proactive scaling tactics.
• Participated in code reviews and technical discussions, fostering a culture of excellence and continuous improvement within the engineering team.

• Developed scalable microservices using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) to enhance the performance and reliability of core financial applications, processing over **1M** transactions daily.
• Implemented secure APIs with authentication protocols such as **OAuth2** and **SAML**, ensuring compliance with data protection regulations and enhancing user access management across different platforms.
• Leveraged **Docker** for containerization, simplifying the deployment process and enabling CI/CD practices that reduced deployment times by **40%**.
• Created interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), building responsive UIs for financial tools that improved user engagement metrics by **30%**.
• Designed and managed event-driven workflows using tools like **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, boosting system reliability and enabling instantaneous trigger responses for critical operations such as payment processing.
• Developed and maintained ETL pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** for real-time data ingestion from various financial sources, enhancing analytics capabilities with a **99%** data accuracy rate.
• Collaborated on machine learning solutions utilizing **scikit-learn** and **Azure ML** for fraud detection, achieving a model accuracy improvement of **15%** year-over-year in identifying suspicious transactions.
• Automated machine learning pipelines for processes like credit scoring and churn prediction, improving integration efficiency and model deployment speed via **MLflow** and **Airflow**.

- Developed and maintained robust APIs using **Node.js** (with **Express** and **NestJS**), ensuring effective data exchange and integration within various microservices.
- Implemented infrastructure-as-code strategies using **Docker** to streamline deployment processes, resulting in a **30%** reduction in deployment times.
- Leveraged **React** (version **18**) and **module bundling** techniques for creating dynamic, modular frontend components, enhancing overall user experiences and maintainability.
- Standardized authentication and data security protocols using **OAuth2**, ensuring secure access across applications with user-friendly Single Sign-On (SSO) capabilities.
- Contributed to the CI/CD pipeline, automating testing and deployment procedures, which improved delivery frequency by **25%** and reduced downtime.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement single sign-on (SSO) integrations, facilitating seamless user experiences across multiple platforms.
- Actively participated in code reviews and mentoring sessions, elevating team productivity and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
- Engineered customized solutions using Golang for backend processes, enhancing performance and reliability in data-intensive applications.
- Demonstrated adaptability in feature development, incorporating innovative strategies to meet evolving business requirements and technical challenges.
